description:
Aug 23-25: Marlborough to Franklin closure

The Blue Line will be closed between Marlborough and Franklin stations starting Saturday, August 23 until the very early hours of Monday, August 25.

Trains coming from the west and downtown will terminate at Franklin Station. And trains from the northeast will terminate at Marlborough. For travel between these two stations, we will have shuttle buses replacing train service, running every 5 minutes.

For more information please visit calgarytransit.com/ctrain-service
